name: mac-control
title: mac-control
description: Control macOS machines (SSH, AppleScript), read Apple Notes, control browsers, and run automations on registered Macs.
author: Copilot <copilot@example.com>

inputs.name: target_host
inputs.description: SSH host (user@host) or 'local' for local mac

inputs.name: command
inputs.description: Shell command or AppleScript to run
